last_episode_to_air.name: The Meaning of Dreams
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jaclyn pushes the idea of a vacation fling on Laurie. Chelsea finds herself in a perilous situation. Gaitok worries about a reprimand.

name: The White Lotus

next_episode_to_air.name: Hide or Seek
next_episode_to_air.overview: Jaclyn looks for a different scene. Piper asks for Lochlan's support before sharing a life update. Chelsea finally gets Rick to open up.

overview: Follow the exploits of various guests and employees at an exclusive tropical resort over the span of a week as with each passing day, a darker complexity emerges in these picture-perfect travelers, the hotel’s cheerful employees and the idyllic locale itself.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: First season follows the vacations of various hotel guests over the span of a week as they relax and rejuvenate in paradise. But with each passing day, a darker complexity emerges in these picture-perfect travelers, the hotel’s cheerful employees and the idyllic locale itself.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Set at an exclusive Sicilian resort, follow the exploits of various guests and employees over the span of a week.
